name: CramFLASH Common Medical Prefixes/Suffixes 30 Random Flashcards App
name_original: CramFLASH Common Medical Prefixes/Suffixes 30 Random Flashcards App
description:
Exam preparation doesn’t have to be stressful – we want you to learn without tension!

Don’t let the pressure of the exam period affect your prep effort. There are many ways to relieve study stress while boosting your performance.

Our CramFLASH Random Flashcard Apps allow you to be used as an aid in memorizing exam information. They come with beautiful backgrounds and calm study music to help you learn and relax!

This app covers some Common Medical Prefixes/Suffixes relevant for the various medical exams.  30 Flashcards included.
